mapper.select: SELECT g_year FROM gradeExample where g_year > #{gradelow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students ( stu_num, stu_ID, stu_name, stu_faculty, dept, grade ) VALUES ( #{stu_num}, #{stu_ID}, #{stu_name}, #{stu_faculty}, #{dept}, #{grade} )
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET stu_ID = #{stu_ID}, stu_name = #{stu_name}, stu_faculty = #{stu_faculty}, dept = #{dept}, grade = #{grade} WHERE stu_num = #{stu_num} ;
